chapters.title: Chapter 17: A Bronze Bear
chapters.info: Lord Branlet Gilyard, p. 372—High Seat of House Gilyard. He is a boy with unruly black curly hair and blue eyes that are too big for his face. He pledged the support of his House to Elayne during his first ever visit to Caemlyn. He is about thirteen years old; his voice is in the process of deepening.
